sentences.english: Beneath those rugged elms, that yew-tree's shade.
sentences.chinese: 那些粗糙的老榆樹下，紫杉蔭裏。

sentences.english: Since then I have never set foot again in that champak-shaded villa garden.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，我再也沒有踏進那個黃蘭花蔭的別墅花園。

sentences.english: Conclusion: There were obvious hemostatic effect of total saponins of Yinfenglun.

sentences.english: Green Goddess Calla Lily make great flowers for shade gardens.
